categories.categoryDescription: Our delicious range of cakes, perfect for any occasion, from birthdays to weddings.

categoryProducts.name: Classic Chocolate Cake
categoryProducts.description: A rich and moist chocolate cake topped with creamy chocolate frosting. Perfect for chocolate lovers.

categoryProducts.name: Vanilla Sponge Cake
categoryProducts.description: Light and fluffy vanilla sponge cake with a smooth vanilla buttercream frosting.

categoryProducts.name: Red Velvet Cake
categoryProducts.description: A vibrant red cake with layers of cream cheese frosting and a soft, moist texture.

categoryProducts.name: Carrot Cake
categoryProducts.description: Moist carrot cake with a hint of cinnamon, topped with rich cream cheese frosting.

categories.categoryDescription: Freshly baked muffins in various flavors, perfect for breakfast or as a snack throughout the day.

categoryProducts.name: Blueberry Muffin
categoryProducts.description: Fluffy muffin packed with fresh blueberries, offering a burst of flavor in every bite.

categoryProducts.name: Chocolate Chip Muffin
categoryProducts.description: A decadent muffin with chunks of rich chocolate chips in every bite.

categoryProducts.name: Banana Nut Muffin
categoryProducts.description: Soft and moist muffin made with ripe bananas and crunchy walnuts.

categoryProducts.name: Apple Cinnamon Muffin
categoryProducts.description: A delicious combination of apple chunks and cinnamon in a soft muffin.

categoryProducts.name: Chocolate Chip Muffin
categoryProducts.description: A decadent muffin with chunks of rich chocolate chips in every bite.

categoryProducts.name: Chocolate Chip Muffin
categoryProducts.description: A decadent muffin with chunks of rich chocolate chips in every bite.

categories.categoryDescription: A variety of delicious loaves, perfect for breakfast or a hearty snack.

categoryProducts.name: Banana Loaf
categoryProducts.description: A moist loaf made with ripe bananas, perfect for breakfast or a sweet afternoon treat.

categoryProducts.name: Cinnamon Swirl Loaf
categoryProducts.description: A delicious cinnamon-swirled loaf, offering a warm and spicy flavor.

categoryProducts.name: Pumpkin Loaf
categoryProducts.description: A seasonal loaf made with fresh pumpkin and warm spices, perfect for fall.

categoryProducts.name: Lemon Poppy Seed Loaf
categoryProducts.description: A light and refreshing loaf made with tangy lemon and crunchy poppy seeds.

categories.categoryDescription: Indulge in our crispy and soft cookies available in various flavors.

categoryProducts.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
categoryProducts.description: Classic homemade chocolate chip cookies with a crispy edge and chewy center.

categoryProducts.name: Oatmeal Raisin Cookies
categoryProducts.description: Healthy oatmeal cookies with plump raisins and a hint of cinnamon for a comforting treat.

categoryProducts.name: Peanut Butter Cookies
categoryProducts.description: Rich and nutty cookies made with smooth peanut butter for a savory flavor.

categoryProducts.name: Sugar Cookies
categoryProducts.description: Sweet and buttery sugar cookies with a delicate crunch, perfect for any occasion.
